snippet: Charges tied to the school’s long-running academic fraud scandal included a lack of institutional control for poor oversight of a department popular with athletes.
abstract: National Collegiate Athletic Assn charges North Carolina with five violations, including lack of institutional control for poor oversight of department popular with student-athletes; charges are broad-based, and do not focus on individual sports.
lead_paragraph: Charges tied to the school’s long-running academic fraud scandal included a lack of institutional control for poor oversight of a department popular with athletes.

headline.main: North Carolina Charged With Five Violations by N.C.A.A.
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Brings Charges in North Carolina Scandal
